summary: The haunted Captain of a Soviet submarine holds the fate of the world in his hands. Forced to leave his family behind, he is charged with leading a covert mission cloaked in mystery.
cast: Ed Harris|David Duchovny|William Fichtner|Lance Henriksen|Johnathon Schaech|Jason Beghe|Dagmara Dominczyk|Derek Magyar|Sean Patrick Flanery|Jason Gray-Stanford|Julian Adams|Kip Pardue|Jordan Bridges|Jacob Witkin|Matt Bushell|Daren Flam|Pedro Hossi|Tessa Robinson|Brien Perry|Wayne Scott Miller|Ashlyn Madden|Austin Auger|Nicolaas Bertelsen|Rootie J. Boyd|Seth Cash|Adam Daniel|Denis Donohue|Seth Marshall|Nathan McCoy|James Peyton|Zach Roberts|Tyler Robinson|Graham Sheldon|Matthew Skomo|Chris Wiley|Pamela Wistrom
title: Phantom
